message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  I think it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $13,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,000 is a bit lower than I can go. I'm willing to come down to $13,500, meeting you halfway.  This is a fair price considering the value the product brings you. What do you think?
